originalMetadata.title: Why You’re Always Tired ( Even When You Do Nothing )
originalMetadata.description:
Are you constantly feeling tired even after a full night's sleep? You're not lazy — you're overstimulated.
In this video, we break down the hidden reasons why your brain feels burnt out even when you’re doing nothing.

Backed by science, psychology, and real-life examples, you'll learn:
Why dopamine is draining your energy
Why your brain can't handle stillness anymore
How you can reclaim your focus, energy, and peace ?

📘 Download My FREE E-Book: The Dopamine Detox
Want to take back control of your brain and your life?
Get The Dopamine Detox: Escape the Trap of Endless Stimulation – a compact, powerful guide to reset your mind and build laser-sharp focus.
👉 [ https://beyondbeing5.gumroad.com/l/ixzkmk ]


🎯 This video is for you if you:

• Feel mentally tired all day
• Struggle with phone addiction
• Find it hard to focus or feel motivated
• Want to break free from the modern burnout cycle

👁 Topics Covered:
• Dopamine & Overstimulation
• Mental Fatigue vs. Physical Fatigue
• The Hidden Cost of Constant Content
• Sleep ≠ Real Recovery
• How to Regain Mental Clarity

🎥 If you like creators like Andrew Huberman, Ali Abdaal, or Matt D’Avella — you’ll love this.

1. Why You’re Always Tired (Even After 8 Hours of Sleep)
2. The Truth About Dopamine & Fatigue
3. You’re Not Lazy — You’re Overstimulated
4. Why You Feel Exhausted Doing Nothing
5. Your Brain Is Burnt Out — Here’s Why
6. Stop Scrolling: This Is Why You Can’t Focus
7. The Reason You’re Always Mentally Tired
8. Brain Fog Explained in 5 Minutes
9. How Your Phone Is Making You Tired
10. Feeling Tired for No Reason? This Is the Cause 

#MindFatigue
#DopamineDetox
#OverstimulationKillsFocus
#TiredAllTheTime
